column2: The course content presents a significant but surmountable challenge for him.
column3: He has graduallly grown in confidence towards the academic challenge the course presents.
column4: I am pleased to say that he has risen to the challenge course content has given him.
column5: While the interdisciplianry nature of the course was hard at first, # has perfromed admirably.
column6: He has impressed me with his persistence and enthusiam for the course.
